Dear Changemakers, Project Rere would like to share your story!

2020 has been a difficult year for so many and we would like to help in the best way we can, by sharing stories about the great work being done by Social Entrepreneurs on the ground, and helping to fund their Social Enterprises.

Apply now for our Podcast! Successful applicants will get a chance to share their story with the world and win grant funding of up to US $25,000.

  • Apply
  • FAQs
  • Schedule

How To Apply

For the first round of our podcasts, we are going to showcase 4-6 outstanding social enterprises which focus on Education in Africa. If you’re doing great work in another sector or region, look out for our future RFPs, and view above to find our season schedule.


Simply fill out the form below to submit your application. Applications for Season 1 of the RFP closes on (specify date) and we will announce the successful applicants 4 weeks later. Each applicant that qualifies will receive the chance to share their story to the world and up to US $25,000 in grant funding.


Criteria

  1. Solving a social problem based on our season
  2. A Social Business that displays the following:
    1. Social Impact
    2. Financial Returns
    3. The social element is built in the business model. You involve the community and those who are vulnerable or in need in your enterprise. You are empowering them to do better - not just teaching them to fish, but also bringing them to the market.

Application Form

Request For Proposal Form

FAQs

Each season is between 4-6 episodes released over a month. The length of the season is dependent on the number of winning enterprises identified over the course of the RfP. Seasons are kept short to allow us to cover more countries, regions and social causes.
Our team will assess all the applicants within 3 weeks of the closing date of the application period. All applicants will hear back on the status of their application 4 weeks after the closing date.
Successful applicants will record a podcast episode with our team. The team will provide you with a list of the necessary software and other recording requirements. The team will require 2 sessions with you for the podcast. One to get to know you and your team, and the second to record the episode.
Our first season will cover Education in Nigeria. Subsequent seasons are listed on the Schedule Tab of the Apply page.
As long as your enterprise is relevant to the season, you are allowed to reapply. Winners of each season will not be permitted to reapply as we would like to cover as many deserving Social Enterprises as possible.
The tentative schedule of our season is based on our current reach as well as feedback received on the potential Social Enterprises that fit a category. We are open to your feedback and suggestions on potential Social Enterprises, feel free to drop us an email at hello@projectrere.com

If you have any other questions, please drop us an email at hello@projectrere.com

Schedule

  1. Education in Nigeria - December 2020
  2. Education in Indonesia - February 2021
  3. Health Care - April 2021
  4. Fintech - June 2021
  5. Sanitation - August 2021
  6. Climate Change - October 2021

Seasons are subject to change and this page will be updated accordingly. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay informed. Subsequent seasons will be added shortly.
